idea:
Unicreds is a unique consumer tech company that’s built upon values of reliability and convenience.It is backed by the latest technologies and utilises machine learning and data science ,to enable students to acquire education loans in a quick and convenient manner.

Our strategic partnerships with some of the top lenders in the country mean that students have a variety of sources to choose the most affordable education loan. No matter which part of the world you are headed to.
name: UNICREDS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

idea: 15 yrs of experience working for Big4 firms (EY, Deloitte) advising banks and financial services clients on risk and finance operations and technology.
